ygData.subject: Murissa Sandwhisper
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the misfortune to get killed by Murissa Sandwhisper the other day.  I was not aware that she would attack someone unprovoked.  I was in North Ro on my
ygData.messageBody:
I had the misfortune to get killed by Murissa Sandwhisper the other day. I
was not aware that she would attack someone unprovoked. I was in North Ro
on my way back to Freeport. I saw her as I was approaching but just assumed
she was another NPC merchant. I had some stuff to sell so moved towards
her. Next thing I know, whack, whack, I'm dead. As I went back to retrieve
my corpse I noticed four other corpses in her vicinity. She was standing
right next to my corpse. I sang the Carillon song and hotkeyed the /corpse
command. Her attitude towards me changed to threatening. I inched closer
and was able to safely pull my corpse away from her.

I now know to avoid her. However, one day I will get my revenge. Does
anyone know if she is part of a quest? Also, when I do get my revenge, is
there a major faction hit with anyone in Freeport?

Thanks
Galtin


> From: "Robert \"Nokker\" Venters" <dread@...>
>
> ummm,, does it work on murissa sandwhisper ,,
> she KOS's me sometimes ,, sometimes she don't ,, I just want to buy water
> without having to run to freeport ,,,
>
